items.htmlTitle: Mellower Coffee - Shanghai Cafe Opens in Bugis
items.snippet:
Feb 13, 2018 ... Mellower Coffee, a popular cafe from Shanghai, has opened another branch in 
Bugis. This is the first global flagship store outside of China.
items.htmlSnippet:
Feb 13, 2018 ... Mellower Coffee, a popular cafe from Shanghai, has opened another branch in
Bugis. This is the first global flagship store outside of China.

metatags.twitter:title: Mellower Coffee – Shanghai Cafe Opens in Bugis
metatags.twitter:description: Mellower Coffee, a popular coffee house from Shanghai, has opened another branch in Bugis. This is probably one of the biggest cafe in town and is also the first global flagship store outside of China. The interior is spacious as there are cosy couches available, which is suitable for chilling out. Carrying coffee beans from many regions of the world, they strive to give guests the best coffee experience, be it in taste or presentation. Their house blend coffee is specially flown in from Shanghai. Sitting before me is one of the most Instagram worthy coffee - Sweet Little Rain
metatags.twitter:creator: @misstamchiak

items.title: Capture of Khansama and Ichhamati River
items.htmlTitle: Capture of Khansama and Ichhamati River
items.snippet:
Sep 23, 2018 ... Khansama was located East of the Bhuri Tista River, which was a major obstacle 
for the attacking troops. It was heavily mined on three sides ...
items.htmlSnippet:
Sep 23, 2018 ... Khansama was located East of the Bhuri Tista River, which was a major obstacle
for the attacking troops. It was heavily mined on three sides ...

metatags.og:title: Capture of Khansama and Ichhamati River
metatags.og:description: Khansama was located East of the Bhuri Tista River, which was a major obstacle for the attacking troops. It was heavily mined on three sides and well fortified with shell-proof bunkers. The position was strongly held by Pak troops with a group of 48 Punjab consisting of 153 Regulars and 78 Razakars. Apart from its normal complement of automatic weapons it was supported by field and medium artillery, 82 mm Mortars and heavy machine guns. The enemy had also made full use of the built-up area of Khansama to strengthen his defences which had been very well coordinated.
metatags.twitter:description: Khansama was located East of the Bhuri Tista River, which was a major obstacle for the attacking troops. It was heavily mined on three sides and well fortified with shell-proof bunkers. The position was strongly held by Pak troops with a group of 48 Punjab consisting of 153 Regulars and 78 Razakars. Apart from its normal complement of automatic weapons it was supported by field and medium artillery, 82 mm Mortars and heavy machine guns. The enemy had also made full use of the built-up area of Khansama to strengthen his defences which had been very well coordinated.
metatags.twitter:title: Capture of Khansama and Ichhamati River

review.author: Sarah T.
review.description: Deep breath 'TOURIST TRAP, TOURIST TRAP!!!!!' True story I ordered the koftas $12.50. Pretty pricey but hey this place is meant to be good right? Dish arrived and I thought ' erm here is the...

review.author: Randy D.
review.description: Easy to find and well worth the trip to Little India. Food is delicious. I had butter chicken, which was yummy and had the right amount of spice. Should've skipped the rice. The naan is fabulous!

review.author: Maggie C.
review.description: Every dish we got was excellent: vegetable pakora, agra chaat, garlic naan, fish tikka and aloo matter. Service was quick and attentive.

review.author: Scott G.
review.description: Khansma delivers and it is oh so good, chicken tikka, samosas, lassis, tandoori Chicken, biryani rice all are so yummy. Love being able to call up and have this delivered to my place.

review.author: Lily F.
review.description: Delicious food! The friendly waiter was patient with me while I stared at their enormous menu and decided on what to get. I ordered the mutton kebab masala and chicken biryani. Both were incredibly...

review.author: Nathan W.
review.description: Food was EXCELLENT! Service was GREAT! and the restaurant was CLEAN. Recommend chicken tikka masala if you like real spicy and butter milk chocked if you like not so spicy and chicken curry...

review.author: Perry O.
review.description: Awesome Flavors (flavours) central Little India! Portion sizes are perfect for sharing. Great drive menu. Top notch service!!!

review.author: Peter N.
review.description: Was expecting more since it was a 4 star spot. Got the chicken masala and chicken half kebab. There wasn't any chicken in the chicken masala. Like 2 pieces, and everything else was sauce and...

review.author: Tina H.
review.description: Been here twice, this would be a great place for you to explore Indian foods! Kind of like the ancient set up, especially the furniture used, very nostalgic (try to move their chairs too, I've...

review.author: Stephen E.
review.description: A fantastic restaurant with wonderful spicy food. The service is fast, efficient and spot on. You will not regret taking the time to try this place out.

review.author: Alexandra D.
review.description: Excellent meal. A little bit more in price than others but safe and flavorsome! The staff were very helpful and the menu had sooo many delicious options.

review.author: Stacey M.
review.description: We found this gem on Yelp. The food was AmaZing and the staff were very attentive and offered some great suggestions. I had the chicken tiki marsala and the agoo gomi (spelling???), a vegetable...

review.author: Majeed F.
review.description: Nicely decorated and air conditioned upstairs, table and chairs are very ornate and clean. The mixed chicken tikka is heavenly! I ordered it as a starter, ended up getting another order, together...

review.author: Dipna S.
review.description: We went here for lunch on a Friday afternoon. It wasn't crowded. We were seated upstairs. They have two options - upstairs has ac and downstairs just fans. It was a hot and humid day in Singapore...

review.author: Funktastic I.
review.description: Food is okayish Currently under renovation hence even air conditioning room is not so cool. Paneer bhajia and chilli bhajia were good. Butter chicken wasn't good. Service was quick. Nans were...
